Description:
The FHIR CarePlan resource is a broad container for summarizing the plan of treatment for a patient. It includes links to the Condition Resource (the patient's long term problem list) and the Goal Resource (the patient's longitudinal goals) as well as in-line detail about upcoming appointments and upcoming orders.

This resource is designed for inpatient-related care plan data.

The search interaction enables the lookup of one or more CarePlan resources, filtered by the specified parameters.

patient.Name: patient
patient.Description: Patient associated with the care plan.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

CarePlan.Name: CarePlan
CarePlan.Description: An instance of the R4 CarePlan resource.

activity.Name: activity
activity.Description: Actions to occur as part of the care plan.

detail.Name: detail
detail.Description: A simple summary of a planned activity.

code.Name: code
code.Description: Detailed description of the type of planned activity.

description.Name: description
description.Description: This provides a textual description of constraints on the intended activity occurrence, including relation to other activities. It may also include objectives, pre-conditions and end-conditions. Finally, it may convey specifics about the activity such as body site, method, route, etc.

goal.Name: goal
goal.Description: Identifies goals that this activity is intended to contribute towards meeting. Reference to a Goal resource.

instantiatesUri.Name: instantiatesUri
instantiatesUri.Description: The URL pointing to an externally maintained protocol, guideline, questionnaire or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this CarePlan activity.

performer.Name: performer
performer.Description: Identifies who's expected to be involved in the activity. Reference to a Practitioner resource.

reasonReference.Name: reasonReference
reasonReference.Description: Reference to a Condition resource that justifies the inclusion of this activity as part of the care plan.

scheduledTiming.Name: scheduledTiming
scheduledTiming.Description: The period, timing or frequency upon which the described activity is to occur.

status.Name: status
status.Description: Identifies what progress is being made for the specific activity.

statusReason.Name: statusReason
statusReason.Description: Reason for the current activity status.

progress.Name: progress
progress.Description: Notes about the progress of the activity.

addresses.Name: addresses
addresses.Description: The list of health issues this CarePlan addresses. Reference to a a Condition resource or resources.

category.Name: category
category.Description: What "kind" of plan this is to support differentiation between multiple co-existing plans; e.g. "Home health", "psychiatric", "asthma", "disease management", "wellness plan", etc. SNOMED 736353004 should be used.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description: The Encounter during which this CarePlan was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

goal.Name: goal
goal.Description: Reference to a Goal resource associated with this CarePlan.

intent.Name: intent
intent.Description: The level of authority/intentionality associated with the CarePlan.

period.Name: period
period.Description: Indicates when the plan did (or is intended to) come into effect and end.

status.Name: status
status.Description: Whether the plan is currently being acted upon, represents future intentions or is now a historical record.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The patient or subject of this care plan.
